description: This header file declares functions related to managing command property objects and arguments within the Bmc2 environment, particularly for the Broadway Management Console. It provides prototypes for functions to clean and free various command-related data structures.

methods.name: Bmc2CleanCommandProperty
methods.description: Cleans the memory and resets the given command property object.

methods.name: Bmc2FreeCommandProperty
methods.description: Frees the memory allocated for the command property object.

methods.name: Bmc2CleanCmdDepArg
methods.description: Cleans the command dependency argument object.

methods.name: Bmc2CleanCmdDepArgBranch
methods.description: Cleans the command dependency argument branch object.

methods.name: Bmc2CleanCmdSimpleArg
methods.description: Cleans the simple command argument object.

methods.name: Bmc2CleanCmdArgValueRange
methods.description: Cleans the command argument value range object.

methods.name: Bmc2FreeCmdArgValueRange
methods.description: Frees the command argument value range object.

methods.name: Bmc2CleanCmdArgHelp
methods.description: Cleans the command argument help object.

methods.name: Bmc2FreeCmdHelpSyntax
methods.description: Frees the command help syntax object.
